axes.name: Emotion vs. Logic
axes.description: This axis represents the tension between emotional responses and logical reasoning, highlighting characters' approaches to situations.

axes.name: Social Status
axes.description: This axis indicates the social hierarchy and status of characters, from common individuals to nobility and royalty.

axes.name: Mystery vs. Clarity
axes.description: This axis reflects the degree of mystery present in the narrative, contrasting ambiguous situations with clear resolutions.

axes.name: Action vs. Inaction
axes.description: This axis measures the level of activity or passivity exhibited by characters in response to challenges or dilemmas.

axes.name: Time Progression
axes.description: This axis tracks the temporal flow of events, from past recollections to present actions and future implications.
